post.text: Weapons of war like those used in Orlando and San Bernardino have no place on our streets.

comment.author: Ethan
comment.text: It's real simple folks, if you want to keep your AR-15 vote for Trump!! if you want the criminals to have the guns and you standing there with a BB gun vote for Hillary!

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: It's funny... with all these shootings why didn't the people being shot use their guns? #thinkaboutwhatyouresaying

replies.author: Ethan
replies.text: The Democrats want to have gun free zones to create soft targets for terrorists groups to attack.. this is a big plan and a policy of Hillary Clinton's
